channel.title: Palantir Foundry UK Status - Incident History

item.title: Object Storage V2 is experiencing degraded performance.
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Data Sync Delays and Interruptions

Summary: The company is investigating an issue that may cause delays or interruptions in the syncs of data into the ontology, indicating a potential major outage impacting platform functionality.

Mar 6, 15:53 GMT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue which may manifest in the following ways:

Syncs of data into the ontology could be delayed or interrupted.

item.title: Multiple components are experiencing degraded performance.
item.content:encoded:
High - Investigating Issue with Ontology-Based Workflows

Summary: The company is currently investigating an issue that may cause delays, interruptions, or failures in ontology-based workflows, impacting notepad documents, queries, and data syncs.

Feb 1, 12:14 GMT
Resolved - The situation is back to normal, and services are operating normally.

Feb 1, 11:12 GMT
Monitoring - We are currently monitoring the issue after taking remediative actions.

Feb 1, 11:07 GMT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue which may manifest in the following ways:

Notepad documents and reports may load slower or fail to load.
Queries to Object Set Service may be slower or fail.
Any ontology-based workflows could be impacted. Queries could be slow or fail to return and syncs of data into the ontology could be delayed or interrupted.
All ontology based workflows may be impacted. User queries may be slower or fail.

item.title: Workshop is experiencing degraded performance.
item.content:encoded:
Jan 31, 23:35 GMT
Resolved - The situation is back to normal, and services are operating normally.

Jan 31, 23:15 GMT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue which may manifest in the following ways:

Some workshop widgets may fail to load.

item.title: Multiple components are experiencing degraded performance.
item.content:encoded:
Jan 12, 16:52 GMT
Resolved - The situation is back to normal, and services are operating normally.

Jan 12, 16:13 GMT
Monitoring - We are currently monitoring the issue after taking remediative actions.

Jan 12, 15:58 GMT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue which may manifest in the following ways:

Some object views and object search may load slower or fail to load.
Queries to Object Set Service may be slower or fail.
The ontology management application may load slower or fail to load.
Some workshop modules may load slower or fail to load.

item.title: Foundry Services Currently Unavailable
item.content:encoded:
Jan 7, 16:45 GMT
Resolved - The situation is back to normal, and services are operating normally.

Jan 7, 16:31 GMT
Investigating - Certain UI components may fail to load within the Foundry Workspace

item.title: Object Storage V2 is experiencing degraded performance.
item.content:encoded:
Dec 9, 23:10 GMT
Resolved - The situation is back to normal, and services are operating normally.

Dec 9, 15:15 GMT
Identified - We have identified a possible solution to this issue and are taking remediative action. While we are remediating issues may still manifest in the following ways:

Any ontology-based workflows could be impacted. Syncs of data into the ontology could be delayed or interrupted.

Dec 9, 13:57 GMT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue which may manifest in the following ways:

Any ontology-based workflows could be impacted. Syncs of data into the ontology could be delayed or interrupted.

item.title: Workshop is experiencing degraded performance.
item.content:encoded:
Dec 1, 17:44 GMT
Resolved - The situation is back to normal, and services are operating normally.

Dec 1, 11:29 GMT
Update - We have identified a possible solution to this issue and are taking remediative action. The issue is only impacting a small subset of workflows. While we are remediating issues may still manifest in the following ways:

Some workshop modules data may be misaligned within workshop views.

Dec 1, 10:16 GMT
Identified - We have identified a possible solution to this issue and are taking remediative action. While we are remediating issues may still manifest in the following ways:

Some workshop modules data may be misaligned within workshop views.

item.content:encoded:

Resolved - The situation is back to normal, and services are operating normally.

item.title: Delays in Response on Tickets sent to Palantir Centralized Support
item.content:encoded:
Nov 14, 17:47 GMT
Resolved - The situation is back to normal, and services are operating normally.

Nov 14, 16:34 GMT
Monitoring - We are currently monitoring the issue after taking remediative actions.

Note: This only affects tickets that are being assigned to or handled by Palantir's central support team. If you have submitted tickets to other Palantir teams, or teams within your own organization, you are unaffected by this notice.

Nov 14, 16:20 GMT
Investigating - Users may experience a delay in response for tickets assigned to Palantir's central support team as there is a technical issue with our internal ticketing infrastructure.

Note: This only affects tickets that are being assigned to or handled by Palantir's central support team. If you have submitted tickets to other Palantir teams, or teams within your own organization, you are unaffected by this notice.

item.title: [Resolved] 2FA Reset Codes May Fail to Send
item.content:encoded:
Jul 20, 16:16 BST
Resolved - The situation is back to normal, and services are operating normally.

Jul 20, 15:49 BST
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue which may manifest in the following ways:

2FA reset codes may not be sent to users, Login errors may note that "second factor of authentication failed"

item.title: Multiple components are experiencing degraded performance.
item.content:encoded:
May 10, 11:30 BST
Resolved - The situation is back to normal, and services are operating normally.

May 10, 11:27 BST
Identified - We have identified a possible solution to this issue and are taking remediative action. While we are remediating issues may still manifest in the following ways:

Some functions may be slower or fail.
Some object views and object search may load slower or fail to load.
Queries to Object Set Service may be slower or fail.
All ontology based workflows may be impacted. User queries may be slower or fail.
Some workshop modules may load slower or fail to load.

May 10, 10:02 BST
Investigating - We are currently investigating ontology performance degradation which may manifest in the following ways:

Some functions may be slower or fail.
Some object views and object search may load slower or fail to load.
Queries to Object Set Service may be slower or fail.
All ontology based workflows may be impacted. User queries may be slower or fail.
Some workshop modules may load slower or fail to load.

Resolved - The situation is back to normal, and services are operating normally.

Apr 14, 13:01 BST
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue which may manifest in the following ways:

Some contour analyses may load slower.
The dataset preparation application may load slower.
Some reports may load slower.

item.title: Resource Management App - Currency View Not Showing
item.content:encoded:
Apr 12, 16:51 BST
Resolved - The situation is back to normal, and services are operating normally.

Apr 12, 13:48 BST
Identified - We have identified a possible solution to this issue and are taking remediative action. While we are remediating issues may still manifest in the following ways: The Resource Management App will not correctly show the currency view if you were early adopters of currency but not using roles in Control Panel to permission access to the Resource Management App.

Apr 12, 12:35 BST
Update - We are currently investigating an issue which may manifest in the following ways: The Resource Management App will not correctly show the currency view if you were early adopters of currency but not using roles in Control Panel to permission access to the Resource Management App.

Apr 12, 12:29 BST
Update - We are currently investigating an issue which may manifest in the following ways: The Resource Management App will not show the currency view in some situations.

Apr 12, 12:07 BST
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue which may manifest in the following ways: The Resource Management App will not show the currency view if you were canarying "currency" and still using group aum permissioning.

item.title: Functions are experiencing degraded performance.
item.content:encoded:
Apr 6, 04:19 BST
Resolved - The situation is back to normal, and services are operating normally.

Apr 5, 22:24 BST
Update - We are still investigating this issue, and will provide an update shortly.

Apr 5, 19:22 BST
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue which may manifest in the following ways:

Some functions may be slower or fail.
